meanings.definition: A member of a countercultural group advocating radical political and social change through the use of protest and unconventional tactics.
meanings.sent1: The yippies gathered in the park to protest peacefully.
meanings.sent2: Many yippies attended the rally to voice their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The yippies decided to have a dance-off as a form of protest.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of protesters, the yippies stood out like colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The yippies' passion for change was contagious among the crowd.

meanings.definition: To engage in or support the activities of the Yippies.
meanings.sent1: She yippies with enthusiasm at every demonstration.
meanings.sent2: We yippies for equality and justice in our society.
meanings.sent3: He yippies joyfully, waving his protest sign in the air.
meanings.sent4: The group yippies together, united in their cause.
meanings.sent5: They yippies for a better future for all.
